docs.abstract: Republican women, both high-profile politicians and ordinary voters, are withdrawing their support from Donald J Trump following series of inflammatory comments from candidate; Trump's lead over Hillary Clinton with Republican women voters has fallen by 13 percent since nominating conventions, to alarm of Trump campaign.
